body_html: @martinwicke Can we move it back to contrib? cause it is becoming a source of errors especially for beginners that don't write explicit model_fn. It is a frequent use case: write tf.keras model, use the converter and then go with the train_and_evaluate loops. If not please extend the tests coverage if it is not tested internally by regular use. Also this is one of the main bridge between the tf.keras API and estimators API but tf.Keras bugfix/review resources are lacking and @fchollet is generally very busy and without substitutes.

body: @martinwicke Can we move it back to contrib? cause it is becoming a source of errors especially for beginners that don't write explicit model_fn. It is a frequent use case: write tf.keras model, use the converter and then go with the train_and_evaluate loops. If not please extend the tests coverage if it is not tested internally by regular use. Also this is one of the main bridge between the tf.keras API and estimators API but tf.Keras bugfix/review resources are lacking and @fchollet is generally very busy  and without substitutes.
